Notes and Letters .A Moravcsik, M.J. Murugesan, P. We tried to concentrate on a few variables that might define the nature of a citation, and to keep the rest of the variables constant.  In particular, we used references in articles in a single journal, in a single specialty of a single branch of science, and in a narrow time period. Specifically, we investigated 30 articles dealing with theoretical high energy physics, and published in Physical Review in the years 1968 to 1972 (inclusive). .X 19	1	1338 33	2	1338 37	1	1338 39	1	1338 40	1	1338 47	1	1338 48	4	1338 55	1	1338 88	1	1338 97	1	1338 98	1	1338 100	1	1338 102	3	1338 103	1	1338 104	1	1338 106	1	1338 107	1	1338 108	2	1338 111	1	1338 113	3	1338 155	1	1338 233	2	1338 253	1	1338 313	1	1338 314	1	1338 359	1	1338 377	1	1338 379	1	1338 395	1	1338 439	1	1338 440	1	1338 456	1	1338 505	1	1338 533	1	1338 545	1	1338 560	1	1338 573	1	1338 592	1	1338 618	1	1338 632	1	1338 635	1	1338 667	1	1338 747	1	1338 748	1	1338 749	1	1338 751	1	1338 764	1	1338 765	1	1338 777	2	1338 778	1	1338 782	1	1338 784	1	1338 791	1	1338 804	1	1338 805	1	1338 893	2	1338 952	1	1338 1016	1	1338 1061	1	1338 1082	1	1338 1085	2	1338 1086	1	1338 1087	2	1338 1182	1	1338 1200	2	1338 1270	1	1338 1273	2	1338 1274	2	1338 1277	1	1338 1278	1	1338 1280	1	1338 1285	2	1338 1286	1	1338 1287	3	1338 1291	1	1338 1301	2	1338 1302	1	1338 1304	3	1338 1313	2	1338 1335	1	1338 1337	3	1338 1338	8	1338 1341	2	1338 1344	3	1338 1347	1	1338 1380	1	1338 1386	1	1338 1428	1	1338 1444	1	1338 1444	1	1338
